entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 15.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 07:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 15.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 14.5°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 26. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
